Sentencas: In this paper, Al2O3 was added to CaO-SrO-B2O3-SiO2 sealing system to tailor the structure of sealing glass ceramics and glass ceramics/metal interfacial reaction.
Titulo: Tuning the interfacial reaction between CaO-SrO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glass-ceramics and Cr-containing interconnect: Crystalline structure vs. glass structure

Sentencas: The addition of alumina in glasses contributes to increasing fraction of bridging oxygen in silica tetrahedral as well as the change in boron environment from three-fold to four-fold (BO4 -> BO3).
Titulo: Tuning the interfacial reaction between CaO-SrO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glass-ceramics and Cr-containing interconnect: Crystalline structure vs. glass structure

Sentencas: The devitrification tendency of glasses also decreases with increasing Al2O3 content.
Titulo: Tuning the interfacial reaction between CaO-SrO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glass-ceramics and Cr-containing interconnect: Crystalline structure vs. glass structure

Sentencas: The condensed glass structure and increasing residual glass content play opposite roles on the interfacial reaction, consequently resulting in a maximum fraction of Cr6+ in reaction couples between Cr2O3 and glass containing 6 mole% Al2O3 at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Tuning the interfacial reaction between CaO-SrO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glass-ceramics and Cr-containing interconnect: Crystalline structure vs. glass structure

Sentencas: In addition, the good bonding can be observed at the interface between Cr-containing interconnect (Crofer 22APU) and glass containing 4 mole% Al2O3, held at 700 degrees C for 100 h. The reported results support the suitability of the prepared glass ceramics as sealing materials for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Tuning the interfacial reaction between CaO-SrO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glass-ceramics and Cr-containing interconnect: Crystalline structure vs. glass structure
